UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: Why is it important for anthropologists to set aside their values in their investigations of Me Too movements around the world?

answers.text: Gender roles are more fluid outside of the United States and other Western democracies.
It enables them to use cross-cultural analysis to understand how all elements of a particular culture, including external pressures, interact with one another.
They should not set aside their views. If anthropologists support the cultural mission of Me Too, they should publicly embrace it as part of their research.
Values can come into play over theoretical or historical issues, but not political ones.
